title: Lake Clark National Park & Preserve: Brochures
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Brochures            Brochures       The following brochures are available for download in PDF format. Click on the name of the brochure for a link to the PDF.     Â      Volcanoes, the Fact Sheet, and Visiting the Backcountry are three of the brochures available for download.    Lake Clark National Park Brochure - Text Side Lake Clark National Park Brochure - Map Side Lake Clark Fact Sheet (.pdf - 261kb - 2 pages) Visiting the Backcountry (.pdf - 1.9mb - 2 pages) Tanalian Trail Map and Information (.pdf - 1.6mb - 2 pages) Lake Clark's Volcanoes (.pdf - 1.7mb - 2 pages) Voluntary Backcountry Registration
